Comments_List: I developed my skills as a composer.
I got to hone my compositional skills through weekly critique sessions.
I learned about undertaking a large scale project that is quite self directed.

The biggest strength were the weekly meetings with all the other Computing and the Arts Music Track Seniors, where we were able to build community and give each other invaluable feedback and incentive for doing quality work.
I like the amount of freedom student have to be creative. On the other hand, a little bit more organization would not have been missed.
